867680.name: Fantasy Grounds - Hellfrost: Heroes and Villains (Savage Worlds)
867680.description:
Hellfrost: Heroes and Villains

AN ARMY OF CHARACTERS AWAIT YOUR COMMAND!
The population of the winter-wracked northern lands is not particularly high, but it is varied.
Commoners and nobles, mages and clerics, healers and warriors, merchants and thieves, wise men and fools, heroes and cowards, all walk the frozen realm.
Inside youll find over 60 characters ready to be dropped into any Hellfrost campaign or used as player characters!
Hellfrost is an epic fantasy setting for the award-winning Savage Worlds RPG.
Within this product you will find:
  • 76 page Reference Manual describing Heroes, villains, hindrances, and minor gods.
  • Over 60 statted and ready to use NPCs
  • 67 Images
Heroes & Villains Compendium requires the Hellfrost Players Guide.
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Kevin Doswell
Requirements: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
